Reviews.Title: Great Set - Great Value
Reviews.Author: TV Viewer
Reviews.Content: I purchased set from Sam's Club in August and enjoyed it tremendously until it was stolen this week in a burglary. I see it's $798 now (I paid $898 for 1st set). I'm so pleased I'm going to buy it again. No cons.Be sure to record the serial number of all valuable sets - I didn't and cannot provide to police .

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy ...
Reviews.Author: Johannes Luijten
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product January 2007, and am still very pleased with the picture quality and performance of this TV. Excellent buy in my opinion.Great number of inputs (could use one more HDMI though)!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Taxi Mom
Reviews.Content: I watched prices for months before ordering this TV. It was the biggest and best brand-- especially for the price! The TV came by freight, which was a pain to coordinate and the frieght guy damaged the bottom of the TV in the process. The company was great though-- they gave me $150 credit on my credit card or the choice of sending the TV back. I didn't care about the damage-- it was in a lower corner and you couldn't even see it. Great buy!!

ProductInfo.Features:
42" lcd hdtv with ATSC/QAM tuner.
Integrated tuner decodes digital ATSC and QAM signals
HDMI for full digital High Definition Connection
3-D Combfilter for a crisp and ultra sharp picture.
Virtual Dolby Surround for a cinema-like audio experience.
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 42MF521D/37 42-Inch 720p LCD HDTV
